Are corporate employee appreciation events getting... a little too childish? In this episode of Corporate Kindergarten, we dive into the most ridiculous appreciation weeks you've ever seen—complete with Mario costumes, fake campfires, and s'mores in office breakrooms.

From CHG Healthcare’s “Putting People First” week to AppCo’s “Spring Fling,” we ask the real questions:
Is this how you show appreciation—or is it just performative cringe?

title: CORPORATE KINDERGARTEN IS BACK!
